meta.title: Come walk with me in my beautiful garden of memory: The 1906 Earthquake and Fire
meta.creator: Stark, Irene Jensen
meta.subject: Earthquakes--California--San Francisco--Personal narratives
Fires--California--San Francisco--Personal narratives
San Francisco Earthquake, Calif., 1906--Personal narratives
Women--California
The 1906 San Francisco Earthquake and Fire Digital Collection
meta.description: Part of: Come walk with me in my beautiful garden of memory, BANC MSS 81/48 c, The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley.
Reminiscences of life in San Francisco, primarily in the Mission District, with information on her family, childhood, the 1906 earthquake and fire, education,
excursions, Danish heritage and customs, employment as an office worker
and a clipping re Stark from the San Francisco Examiner (Sept. 24, 1980)
meta.publisher: The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley, CA 94720-6000; http://bancroft.berkeley.edu/
